sentences: Renato Sellani (8 January 1926 â€“ 31 October 2014) was an Italian jazz pianist and composer.
Born in Senigallia, Sellani started his professional career in 1954, when he entered the Basso-Valdambrini Quintet.
In 1958 he started a long collaboration with his longtime friend Franco Cerri.
Sellani was an incidental music composer for stage plays, and his works include several scores  for the Piccolo Teatro in Milan and a long collaboration with the stage company of Tino Buazzelli.
